question: (Kelly of the Clue Crew reports from the Abraham Lincoln Presidential Library in Springfield, IL.)  Though it wasn't in original drafts of the Gettysburg Address, Lincoln ad-libbed this 2-word phrase--later added to the Pledge of Allegiance--& added it to copies like this one, which he wrote out later
